subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: It has been only three and a half months since the Hurricanes' Erik Cole was nearly paralyzed by a neck injury, but he's still playing in the Stanley Cup finals, which with end with a deciding Game 7 tonight in Carolina.
snippet: It has been only three and a half months since the Hurricanes' Erik Cole was nearly paralyzed by a neck injury, but he's still playing in the Stanley Cup finals, which with end with a deciding Game 7 tonight in Carolina.
